name: RemoveTagFromTask
description:
Remove a tag from a task in Asana.

Use this tool to remove a specific tag from a task in Asana. This action requires write access to tasks.

parameters.name: task_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task from which the tag should be removed.

parameters.name: tag_gid_to_remove
parameters.description: The GID of the tag to be removed from the task in Asana.

value_schema.description: The tag's gid to remove from the task.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: If true, formats the response for readability with line breaks and indentation. Use primarily for debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.
